roleset.name: get together with
roleset.note: CONSULT-V NOTES: Ignore adjectival usages like "a prominent consulting firm". (from consult.01-v)

CONSULTATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry consult.01, OntoNotes grouping senses 1& 2; maps to VN classes meet-36.3-1, inquire-37.1.2, and battle-36.4. Framed by Claire. (from consultation.01-n)
CONSULTING-N NOTES: Based on verb entry consult.01; corresponds to Verbnet entries meet-36.3-1, inquire-37.1.2, and battle-36.4. (from consulting.01-n)
CONSULT-N NOTES: Based on verb entry consult.01; corresponds to Verbnet entries meet-36.3-1, inquire-37.1.2, and battle-36.4. (from consult.01-n)

example.name: passive, with topic
example.text: In a statement, Jaguar's board said they-1 ``were not consulted *trace*-1 about the (Ridley decision) in advance and were surprised at the action taken.''

example.name: active, just transitive
example.text: Jaguar was shocked by Mr. Ridley's decision, because management had believed [the government]-1 wouldn't lift the golden share without *trace*-1 consulting the company first.

example.name: Arg 1 & ArgMs
example.text: He had frequent telephone consultations with Mr. Brady andMichael Boskin , chairman of the counsel of economic advisers .
example.arg: with Mr. Brady and Michael Boskin, chairman of the counsel of economic advisers.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The board found that her first consultation with a physician regarding the hip replacement surgery occurred in April, 2005

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: His works were based on his consultation of ancient Greek manuscripts.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: [Laurance V. Allen , 44 , who had been director for North America]-2 , resigned *-2 to pursue other business interests and do some consulting.

example.name: active, just transitive
example.text: Is there anything I can do to stop the consult with an attorney about filing a chapter bankruptcy?

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: [Laurance V. Allen , 44 , who had been director for North America]-2 , resigned *-2 to pursue other business interests and do some consulting.

example.name: active, just transitive
example.text: Is there anything I can do to stop the consult with an attorney about filing a chapter bankruptcy?
